task.title: Viewing available Ethernet interfaces
task.shortdesc: System administrators can view available Ethernet interfaces by using the list ethernet-interface command on the command line.

taskbody.context: You can view the available Ethernet interfaces by using the command line, or by using the . For more information about using the to view the available Ethernet interfaces, see .

step.cmd: View the available Ethernet interfaces by entering the following command:

example.screen: list ethernet-interface eth0 eth1 eth2 eth3 eth4 eth5 eth6 eth7 ha0 ha1 mgt0 mgt1
